sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* PDMC0010.SEARCH00.제작 견적서 -견적용*//* [제작견적서 견적용 헤더] */ '0' CHK /*선택*/ , A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호 */ , A.PREE_NAME /*견적명 */ , A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자 */ , A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호 */ , A.ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ , A.MEMO_FILD /*비고*/ FROM PD_ESTIMH A /* [제작견적서 견적용 헤더] */ WHERE 1=1 AND JOBN_NUMB IS NULL /*제작번호가 없는 순수견적*/
ORDER BY A.PREE_CODE

SELECT /* PDMC0010.SEARCH01.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세*//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세] */ '0' CHK /*선택*/ ,A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,A.PREE_IDXX /*견적순번*/ ,A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ ,A.OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_ESTIMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /* PDMC0010.SEARCH02.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세*//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세] */ '0' CHK /*선택*/ ,#ESTI_DATE# AS ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,#PREE_NAME# AS PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,'' AS PREE_IDXX /*견적순번*/ ,#PREE_CODE# AS PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,'' AS MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,'1' AS TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,'0' AS ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,'0' AS ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ ,'' AS OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,'' AS CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,'' AS SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_TYPEXD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.TYPE_CODE = #TYPE_CODE#

SELECT /* PDMC0010.SEARCH10.견적 템플릿 팝업 조회*//* [견적 템플릿 팝업 조회] */ TYPE_CODE /*템플릿 코드*/ , TYPE_NAME /*템플릿명*/ FROM PD_TYPEXH WHERE 1=1
TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #TYPE_NAME# || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE_CODE ASC

SELECT /* PDMC0020.SEARCH10.제작의뢰건 조회*//* [제작의뢰조회 조회] */ A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.JOBN_NAME /*제작건명*/ ,A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*광고주명*/ ,B.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,D.DOCU_IDXX /*결재ID*/ ,D.APPR_STAT /*결재상태*/ ,SF_GET_COMMNAME('APPR_STAT', D.APPR_STAT) APPR_STAT_STR /*결재상태*/ ,SF_GET_COMMNAMEREF('APPR_STAT', D.APPR_STAT, '1') APPR_STAT_PROC /*결재상태*/ FROM PD_JOBNXM A LEFT JOIN PD_ESTIMH B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_APPRXH D ON A.DOCU_IDXX = D.DOCU_IDXX AND A.APPR_SEQN = D.APPR_SEQN WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_FLAG IN ('SF01')
A.JOBN_NUMB LIKE '%' || #JOBN_NUMB# || '%'
A.JOBN_NAME LIKE '%' || #JOBN_NAME# || '%'
B.PREE_NAME IS NULL
D.APPR_STAT = #APPR_STAT#
ORDER BY A.JOBN_NUMB ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PD_ESTIMH ( /* PDMC0010.SAVE00.제작 견적서 -견적용 헤더 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 헤더] */ PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,ESTI_AMTX /* 견적금액 */ ,MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ ,PLPT_FLAG /* 기획팀전자결재 */ ,PDPT_FLAG /* 제작팀견자결재 */ ,PMPT_FLAG /* 제작관리팀전자결재 */ ,REF1_FILD /* 여분1 */ ,REF2_FILD /* 여분2 */ ,REF3_FILD /* 여분3 */ ,REF4_FILD /* 여분4 */ ,REF5_FILD /* 여분5 */ ,INST_USID /* 생성자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 생성일자 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일자 */ ) VALUES ( #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ ,#PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ ,#ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ ,#JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ ,#ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ ,#MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ ,'AP01' /* 기획팀전자결재 최초 결재상태 */ ,'AP01' /* 제작팀견자결재 최초 결재상태*/ ,'AP01' /* 제작관리팀전자결재 최초 결재상태*/ ,#REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ ,#REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ ,#REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ ,#REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ ,#REF5_FILD# /* 여분5 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /*입력작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ ,#UPDT_USID# /*수정작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*수정일시*/ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PD_ESTIMH /* PDMC0010.UPDATE00.제작 견적서 -견적용 헤더 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 헤더] */ SET PREE_NAME = #PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ , ESTI_DATE = #ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ , JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ , ESTI_AMTX = #ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ , MEMO_FILD = #MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ , REF1_FILD = #REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ , REF2_FILD = #REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ , REF3_FILD = #REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ , REF4_FILD = #REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ , REF5_FILD = #REF5_FILD# /* 여분5 */ , UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /*수정자*/ ,UPDT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PD_ESTIMD ( /* PDMC0010.SAVE01.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세] */ PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,PREE_IDXX /* 견적순번 */ ,ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,ITEM_CODE /* 견적항목코드 */ ,TYPE_QTYX /* 수량 */ ,ESTI_PRCE /* 견적단가 */ ,ESTI_AMTX /* 견적금액 */ ,OUTS_CODE /* 제작사코드 */ ,MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ ,SORT_ORDR /* 정렬순번 */ ,INST_USID /* 생성자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 생성일자 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일자 */ ) VALUES ( #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ ,#PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ ,#PREE_IDXX# /* 견적순번 */ ,#ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ ,#JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ ,#ITEM_CODE# /* 견적항목코드 */ ,#TYPE_QTYX# /* 수량 */ ,#ESTI_PRCE# /* 견적단가 */ ,#ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ ,#OUTS_CODE# /* 제작사코드 */ ,#MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ ,#SORT_ORDR# /* 정렬순번 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /*입력작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ ,#UPDT_USID# /*수정작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*수정일시*/ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PD_ESTIMD /* PDMC0010.UPDATE01.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세] */ SET ESTI_DATE = #ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ , PREE_NAME = #PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ , JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ , ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# /* 제작항목코드 */ , TYPE_QTYX = #TYPE_QTYX# /* 수량 */ , ESTI_PRCE = #ESTI_PRCE# /* 견적단가 */ , ESTI_AMTX = #ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ , OUTS_CODE = #OUTS_CODE# /* 제작사코드 */ , MEMO_FILD = #MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ , SORT_ORDR = #SORT_ORDR# /* 정렬구분 */ , REF1_FILD = #REF1_FILD# /* 비고1 */ , REF2_FILD = #REF2_FILD# /* 비고2 */ , REF3_FILD = #REF3_FILD# /* 비고3 */ , REF4_FILD = #REF4_FILD# /* 비고4 */ , REF5_FILD = #REF5_FILD# /* 비고5 */ , UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /*수정자*/ ,UPDT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ AND PREE_IDXX = #PREE_IDXX# /* 견적순번 */
UPDATE PD_ESTIMH SET ESTI_AMTX = ( SELECT SUM(ESTI_AMTX) FROM PD_ESTIMD WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ) WHERE PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT '1' || LPAD(CAST(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PREE_CODE,2,6)),0) AS NUMERIC) + 1,6,'0') FROM PD_ESTIMH WHERE 1=1 AND LENGTH(PREE_CODE) < 8
SELECT NVL(MAX(CAST(PREE_IDXX AS NUMERIC)),0) + 1 FROM PD_ESTIMD WHERE PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
sqlMap.update:
BEGIN
UPDATE PD_ESTIMH SET JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ; UPDATE PD_ESTIMD SET JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ; END;
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* PDMC0010.PRINT00.제작 예상견적서 -제작용 헤더 *//* [제작견적서 제작용 헤더출력] */ A.PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ , A.PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ , A.ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ , A.ESTI_AMTX /* 견적금액 */ , F.OFFI_NAME AS HOME_NAME /* 농심기획 */ , F.ADDR_DESC AS HOME_ADDR /* 농심기획주소 */ , F.BSNS_NUMB /* 농심기획사업자번호 */ , F.OWNR_NAME AS HOME_OWNR /* 농심기획대표자 */ FROM PD_ESTIMH A LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#

SELECT /* PDMC0010.PRINT01.제작 견적서 -예상견적용 상세 하단 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세 출력] */ A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호 */ , B.SUBX_NAME /* 견적항목명 */ , A.MEMO_FILD /*견적내용 */ , A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량 */ , A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가 */ , A.ESTI_AMTX /*금액 */ FROM PD_ESTIMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
